intro: Aloe subulata, commonly known as the needle aloe, is a succulent plant native to South Africa. It features rosettes of narrow, spine-tipped leaves that are typically blue-green in color. The plant produces yellow flowers on tall, erect stems during the summer months. It is well adapted to arid environments and requires minimal water. Aloe subulata is often used in ornamental gardening due to its unique appearance and hardy nature.
